alert.note: Alert for Alleghany; Botetourt (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 15 at 3:20PM EDT by NWS Blacksburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Alleghany and northwestern Botetourt Counties in west central Virginia through 345 PM EDT... At 320 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Gala, or near Covington, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Clifton Forge... Iron Gate... Glen Wilton... Low Moor... and Selma. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Locally heavy rain will quickly reduce visibility and result in ponding of water on roadways, standing water in low lying areas, and minor flooding of creeks, streams, and areas of poor drainage. Drivers are urged to slow down and use extra caution to avoid hydroplaning.
